name: SMITE
content:
game:
  appid: 386360
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/Smite
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/Smite
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Visual Studio Runtime 2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/Smite
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Dot Net 4.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/Smite
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Windows 10 mode for Wine
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/Smite
    value: win10
system:
  env:
    PBA_ENABLE: '0'
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: esync-staging-pba-3.16-x86_64
